divs: sighting detailsi was just outside of my apartment in pullman, wa having a smoke break from studying for finals. i heard a plane nearby, and i saw it was a large military cargo jet. around this time of year, they conduct multiple training ops at low elevations etc. anyways, i decided to keep looking up, and as i was looking nnw, i saw a small black object moving s really fast in a straight line. it was about a half mile away over a hill\neighborhood, maybe 200-300 ft elevation, and i would estimate it to be travelling around 100mph. at first i thought it was a local hawk that chills on a street lamp looking for food, but when i didnt see its wings flap, and i realized how fast it was moving i payed closer attention. i watched it turn around, and head n, then it came ene towards my location. the closest it got to me was probably 500ft, then it went back to a ssw heading, it gained elevation, and dissapeared into a cloud. i'd say the object was about 20ft in circumference, black, perfect sphere, moved very fluidly, silent, and had no reflection from the sun. it wasnt a jet, nor a bird.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pullman
There were no other sightings in Pullman on or around April 20th 2007
